metadata.title: CVE-2021-40529 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
The ElGamal implementation in Botan through 2.18.1, as used in Thunderbirdand other products, allows plaintext recovery because, during interactionbetween two cryptographic libraries, a certain dangerous combination of theprime defined by the receiver's public key, the generator defined by thereceiver's public key, and the sender's ephemeral exponents can lead to across-configuration attack against OpenPGP.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40529` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

botan - 2.19.2+dfsg-1
libbotan-2-19 - 2.19.2+dfsg-1
python3-botan - 2.19.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: botan package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.19.2+dfsg-1').
